com.davidbracewell.cache

Interface Cache<K,V>

  • Type Parameters:
    K - the type parameter
    V - the type parameter
    All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    AutoCalculatingCache<K,V>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultAutoCalculatingCache, DefaultCache, GuavaLoadingCache, NoOptCache

    public interface Cache<K,V>
extends AutoCloseable
    The type Cache.
    Author:
    David B. Bracewell

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void clear()
      Clears the cache of all stored keys and values
      boolean containsKey(K key)
      Determines if a key is in the cache or not
      V get(K key)
      Gets the value associated with a key
      String getName()
      Gets name.
      void invalidate(K key)
      Removes a single key
      default void invalidateAll(Iterable<? extends K> keys)
      Clears the cache of all given keys
      void put(K key, V value)
      Adds a key value pair to the cache overwriting any value that is there
      V putIfAbsent(K key, V value)
      Adds a key value pair if the key is not already in the cache
      long size()
      Size long.

        close

    • Method Detail

      • clear

        void clear()
        Clears the cache of all stored keys and values

      • containsKey

        boolean containsKey(K key)
        Determines if a key is in the cache or not
        Parameters:
        key - The key to check
        Returns:
        True if the key is in the cache, False if not

      • get

        V get(K key)
        Gets the value associated with a key
        Parameters:
        key - The key
        Returns:
        The value associated with the key or null

      • getName

        String getName()
        Gets name.
        Returns:
        The name of the cache

      • invalidate

        void invalidate(K key)
        Removes a single key
        Parameters:
        key - The key to remove

      • invalidateAll

        default void invalidateAll(Iterable<? extends K> keys)
        Clears the cache of all given keys
        Parameters:
        keys - The keys to remove

      • put

        void put(K key,
         V value)
        Adds a key value pair to the cache overwriting any value that is there
        Parameters:
        key - The key
        value - The value

      • putIfAbsent

        V putIfAbsent(K key,
              V value)
        Adds a key value pair if the key is not already in the cache
        Parameters:
        key - The key
        value - The value
        Returns:
        The old value if put, null if not

      • size

        long size()
        Size long.
        Returns:
        The current size of the cache
